dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Takedown Notice]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, June 28, 2005 11:35 AM
To: legal@mediavast.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Takedown Notice]

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


-------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] DMCA Takedown Notice
Date: Mon, 27 Jun 2005 17:16:27 -0400
From: Legal Affairs <legal@mediavast.com>
Reply-To: legal@mediavast.com
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

Attached please find a DMCA Takedown Notice for www.mandy-m.org at IP:
67.19.208.242.


--
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
